summary:
Academic expert in Foreign Policy and Learning and Teaching.

Research focused particularly on: the foreign policies of Russia, the EU and its member states; international intervention; social media.

[{'url': 'https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/jcms.13496', 'title': 'Nakedly Normative: A Feminist (Re‐)Imagination of Planetary Politics', 'description': 'This is the outcome of a hugely fulfilling collaborative effort w/co-authors: Roberta Guerrina & Katharine Wright. We apply a critical feminist lens to argue the potential of a normative power approach in realising a planetary politics can only be fulfilled if political and societal actors embrace four ‘Es’: ethic of care, empathy, emancipation & equity.
